    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Paths in Jewish Thought &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/jewishthought
     </span>

             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19361409">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19361409">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19361409">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19361409">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19361409" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19361410">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19361410">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19361410">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19361410">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19361410" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19361411">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19361411">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19361411">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias (cannot be used as sources in the paper per se, but can serve as pointers)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19361411">
          <div id="boxatt19361411" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22660898">
              <a id="link_22660898" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660898,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription. Several hundred online encyclopedias by reputable publishers. Good for topic-finding, narrowing, and bibliographies.
               <a href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/entry/brilljud/judaism_philosophy_and_theology_of_in_modern_times_in_europe/0">
                Sample entry
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660897">
              Encyclopedia Judaica (2nd ed., 2007)
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Trexler Library Reference Collection 296.03 E56j)
               <br />
               Signed entries by invited contributors. Good for topic-finding and topic-narrowing.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660899">
              <a id="link_22660899" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660899,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19361412">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19361412">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19361412">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Academic work and primary documents as published in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19361412">
          <div id="boxatt19361412" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22660903">
              <a id="link_22660903" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660903,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660902">
              <a id="link_22660902" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660902,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Good for primary documents pre-1923 that are out of copyright.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660901">
              <a id="link_22660901" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660901,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19361413">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19361413">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19361413">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Academic work published as journal articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19361413">
          <div id="boxatt19361413" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22660904">
              <a id="link_22660904" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660904,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22690432">
              <a id="link_22690432" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22690432,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to research literature in world religions and related studies, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660906">
              <a id="link_22660906" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660906,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for European history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660907">
              <a id="link_22660907" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=jph" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660907,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767659}); ">
               Index to Jewish Periodicals
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for scholarship on Jewish religion and culture. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660905">
              <a id="link_22660905" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660905,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22660908">
              <a id="link_22660908" href="http://jnul.huji.ac.il/rambi/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22660908,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Paths in Jewish Thought', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22660908}); ">
               RambiWeb
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free index of scholarship on Jewish religion and culture.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5198440" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19361414">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19361414">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19361414">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19361414">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19361414" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19361415">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19361415">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19361415">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19361415">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19361415" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
